title: Marathon
description:
You are given four distinct integers
a
,
b
,
c
,
d
.
Timur and three other people are running a marathon. The value
a
is the distance that Timur has run and
b
,
c
,
d
correspond to the distances the other three participants ran.
Output the number of participants in front of Timur.
input_specification:
The first line contains a single integer
t
(
1≤t≤104
) — the number of test cases.
The description of each test case consists of four distinct integers
a
,
b
,
c
,
d
(
0≤a,b,c,d≤104
).
output_specification: For each test case, output a single integer — the number of participants in front of Timur.
